title: Shopee Product Overview Hourly Daily Report
description: Hourly daily report providing an overview of product-related metrics on Shopee

merchantID.description: A unique merchant code for GRAAS clients

siteNickNameId.description: A unique merchant's store code for GRAAS clients

Date.description: Date and time of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY HH:mm'

Product_Visitors_Visit.description: Total number of visitors who visited the product during the specified hour

Product_Page_Views.description: Total number of page views for the product during the specified hour

Items_Visited.description: Total number of items visited during the specified hour

Product_Bounce_Visitors.description: Total number of visitors who bounced from the product page during the specified hour

Product_Bounce_Rate.description: Bounce rate for the product page during the specified hour as a percentage

Search_Clicks.description: Total number of clicks from search results to the product during the specified hour

Likes.description: Total number of likes received for the product during the specified hour

Product_Visitors_Add_to_Cart.description: Total number of visitors who added the product to the cart during the specified hour

Units_Add_to_Cart.description: Total number of units added to the cart for the product during the specified hour

Conversion_Rate_Add_to_Cart.description: Conversion rate from product view to adding to cart during the specified hour as a percentage

Buyers_Placed_Order.description: Total number of buyers who placed an order during the specified hour

Units_Placed_Order.description: Total number of units placed in orders during the specified hour

Items_Placed.description: Total number of items placed in orders during the specified hour

Sales_Placed_Order.description: Sales amount information for placed orders during the specified hour

Conversion_Rate_Placed_Order.description: Conversion rate from adding to cart to placing an order during the specified hour as a percentage

Buyers_Paid_Order.description: Number of buyers who paid for the order during the specified hour

Units_Paid_Order.description: Number of units paid for in the order during the specified hour

Items_Paid.description: Number of items paid for in the order during the specified hour

Sales_Paid_Order.description: Sales amount information for paid orders during the specified hour

Conversion_Rate_Paid_Order.description: Conversion rate from placing an order to paying for the order during the specified hour as a percentage
